title: Verbs with a dative object (5-Minute German Grammar)

media:group.media:title: Verbs with a dative object (5-Minute German Grammar)
media:group.media:description:
Need these slides for your class? Download them here: http://bit.ly/2pDquwQ
About the series producer: https://doktorfrag.wordpress.com

5-Minute German Grammar covers fundamental aspects of German grammar in a shorter period of time, which helps to keep the instructional focus sharp and the material easy to learn. This high definition video with closed captioning introduces verbs that take a dative object. Video highlights include:

00:08 Review of accusative case and direct objects
00:27 List of some verbs taking a dative object
01:18 Rules for using verbs taking a dative object
02:43 Verbs with an inseparable “ent-” or “nach-” prefix
03:14 Verbs with a separable “bei-” or “zu-” prefix
